DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study was to investigate whether an Internet-based cognitive behavioural intervention would have an effect on the symptoms of chronic back pain.
DOC.brief_title: Internet-based Cognitive Behavioural Treatment for Chronic Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: All participants were screened in a live, structured interview before inclusion. ItÂ´s a experimental design with a treatment and a control group measured before and after a treatment period.
DOC.criteria: age between 1865 years access to the Internet having been in contact with a physician back pain of chronic nature in current employment or on shortterm sick leave(not longer than 6 months) wheelchair user surgical treatment planned history of cardiovascular treatment severe depression
